mapper.update: update step.followup set create_date = #{createDate}, complaint = #{complaint}, history_present_illness = #{historyPresentIllness}, history_past_illness = #{historyPastIllness}, personal_history = #{personalHistory}, allergic_history = #{allergicHistory}, family_history = #{familyHistory}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, sbp = #{sbp}, dbp = #{dbp}, meanbp = #{meanbp}, heart_rate = #{heartRate}, body_temp = #{bodyTemp}, breathe = #{breathe}, blood_sugar = #{bloodSugar}, phys_exam = #{physExam}, lab_exam = #{labExam}, dz_dx = #{dzDx}, sbp_target = #{sbpTarget}, dbp_target = #{dbpTarget}, medicine_rx = #{medicineRx}, is_referral = #{isReferral}, patient_id = #{patientId}, user_id = #{userId}, next_datetime = #{nextDatetime}, next_confirmed = #{nextConfirmed} where followup_id = #{followupId}
mapper.insert: insert into step.followup (create_date, complaint, history_present_illness, history_past_illness, personal_history, allergic_history, family_history, height, weight, sbp, dbp, meanbp, heart_rate, body_temp, breathe, blood_sugar, phys_exam, lab_exam, dz_dx, sbp_target, dbp_target, medicine_rx, is_referral, patient_id, user_id, next_datetime, next_confirmed ) values ( #{createDate}, #{complaint}, #{historyPresentIllness}, #{historyPastIllness}, #{personalHistory}, #{allergicHistory}, #{familyHistory}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{sbp}, #{dbp}, #{meanbp}, #{heartRate}, #{bodyTemp}, #{breathe}, #{bloodSugar}, #{physExam}, #{labExam}, #{dzDx}, #{sbpTarget}, #{dbpTarget}, #{medicineRx}, #{isReferral}, #{patientId}, #{userId}, #{nextDatetime}, #{nextConfirmed} )
mapper.select: select complaint, history_present_illness, history_past_illness, personal_history, allergic_history, family_history from step.followup where followup_id = #{followupId}
select height, weight, sbp, dbp, meanbp, heart_rate, body_temp, breathe, blood_sugar, phys_exam, lab_exam from step.followup where followup_id = #{followupId}
select riskfactorclass_id as riskfactorclassId, riskfactorclass_name as riskfactorclassName from step.riskfactorclass

select A.riskfactor_id AS riskfactorId, A.riskfactor_name AS riskfactorName, B.checked from step.riskfactor AS A left join step.riskfactor_followup AS B on A.riskfactor_id = B.riskfactor_id where A.riskfactorclass_id = #{riskfactorclassId} and B.followup_id = #{followupId}
select A.riskfactor_id AS riskfactorId, A.riskfactor_name AS riskfactorName from step.riskfactor AS A where A.riskfactorclass_id = #{riskfactorclassId}
mapper.insert: insert into step.riskfactor_followup (riskfactor_id, followup_id, checked) values (#{riskfactorId}, #{followupId}, #{checked})
mapper.select: select dz_dx AS dzDx, sbp_target AS sbpTarget, dbp_target AS dbpTarget, medicine_rx AS medicineRx, is_referral AS isReferral, next_datetime AS nextDatetime from step.followup where followup_id = #{followupId}

select A.practicerx_id as practicerxId, A.practicerx_name as practicerxName, B.checked, B.note from step.practicerx AS A left join step.practicerx_followup AS B on A.practicerx_id = B.practicerx_id where B.followup_id = #{followupId}
select A.practicerx_id as practicerxId, A.practicerx_name as practicerxName from step.practicerx AS A
mapper.insert: insert step.practicerx_followup (practicerx_id, followup_id, note, checked) values (#{practicerxId}, #{followupId}, #{note}, #{checked})
mapper.select: select patient_name, gender, age, prc_id, next_confirmed from step.followup AS A left join step.patient AS B on A.patient_id = B.patient_id where DATE(next_datetime) = #{nextDate}
select * from step.followup where patient_id = #{patientId} order by create_date desc limit 1

select.if: select count(case when C.dbp < C.dbp_target and C.sbp < C.sbp_target then 1 else null end) AS numValid, count(case when C.dbp >= C.dbp_target or C.sbp >= C.sbp_target then 1 else null end) AS numInValid from ( select dbp, sbp, dbp_target, sbp_target from followup AS A inner join ( select patient_id, max(create_date) AS latestCreateDate from step.followup where create_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) group by patient_id ) AS B on A.patient_id = B.patient_id and A.create_date = B.latestCreateDate inner join step.patient AS C on B.patient_id = C.patient_id inner join user AS D using (team_id) where A.sbp_target is not null and A.dbp_target is not null and D.user_id = #{userId} ) AS C

select count(case when C.dbp < C.dbp_target and C.sbp < C.sbp_target then 1 else null end) AS numValid, count(case when C.dbp >= C.dbp_target or C.sbp >= C.sbp_target then 1 else null end) AS numInValid from ( select dbp, sbp, dbp_target, sbp_target from followup AS A inner join ( select patient_id, max(create_date) AS latestCreateDate from step.followup where create_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) group by patient_id ) AS B on A.patient_id = B.patient_id and A.create_date = B.latestCreateDate inner join step.patient AS C on B.patient_id = C.patient_id inner join user AS D using (team_id) inner join hospital AS E on D.hospital_id = E.hospital_id where A.sbp_target is not null and A.dbp_target is not null and E.admin_id = #{userId} ) AS C
